item.title: Kristen add a quote by Sahara Sunday Spain
item.description: "When I look through your eyes, I see a disguise, and in that disguise, I see love, and in that love, you are fabulous." -- Sahara Sunday Spain

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Jewel Kilcher
item.description: "I've learned that not all poetry lends itself to music-some thoughts need to be sung only against the silence. There are softer and less tangible parts of ourselves that are so essential to peace, to openheartedness, to unfolding the vision and the spiritual realm of our lives, to exposing our souls. " -- Jewel Kilcher

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Robert James Waller from Old songs in a New Cafe
item.description:
"In a sense, romance is practical. It fuels your life and propels your work with a sense of vision, hope and caring. Because you are working for others, not just for yourself, your work takes on a certain quality that it will not otherwise have
" -- Robert James Waller from Old songs in a New Cafe
